data.fluent-bit.conf:
[SERVICE]
    Flush        1
    Daemon       Off
    Log_Level    info
    Parsers_File /fluent-bit/parser/parsers.conf

[INPUT]
    Name   tail
    Path   /u01/logs/*.audit.json
    Tag    audit_text
    Mem_Buf_Limit 10MB
    Key    event
    Multiline    On
    Parser_Firstline   log4jMultilineParser

[INPUT]
    Name   tail
    Path   /u01/logs/*.audit.text
    Tag    audit_json
    Mem_Buf_Limit 10MB
    Key    event
    

[INPUT]
    Name   tail
    Path   /u01/logs/*.sensitive
    Tag    sensitive
    Mem_Buf_Limit 10MB
    Key    event
    Multiline    On
    Parser_Firstline   log4jMultilineParser

[INPUT]
    Name   tail
    Path   /u01/logs/*.log
    Tag    application
    Mem_Buf_Limit 10MB
    Key    event
    Multiline    On
    Parser_Firstline   log4jMultilineParser

[INPUT]
    Name   tail
    Path   /u01/logs/*.access
    Tag    access
    Mem_Buf_Limit 10MB
    Key    event
    

[FILTER]
    Name modify
    Match audit_text
    Set sourcetype log4j
    Set index aud-index

[FILTER]
    Name modify
    Match audit_json
    Set sourcetype _json
    Set index aud-index

[FILTER]
    Name modify
    Match sensitive
    Set sourcetype log4j
    Set index sensitive-index

[FILTER]
    Name modify
    Match application
    Set sourcetype log4j
    Set index test-index

[FILTER]
    Name modify
    Match access
    Set sourcetype access_combined
    Set index test-index

[FILTER]
    Name modify
    Match *
    Add host ${POD_NAME}
    Add environment ${POD_NAMESPACE}
    Add nodetype openshift
    Add application simple
    Add cluster utv

[FILTER]
    Name nest
    Match *
    Operation nest
    Wildcard environment
    Wildcard application
    Wildcard cluster
    Wildcard nodetype
    Nest_under fields

[OUTPUT]
    Name splunk
    Match *
    Host ${SPLUNK_HOST}
    Port ${SPLUNK_PORT}
    Splunk_Token ${HEC_TOKEN}
    Splunk_Send_Raw On
    TLS         On
    TLS.Verify  Off
